title: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
content: Days of competition culminate in a fishing contest rooted in efforts to cement local peace.

originalTitle: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
title: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
content: In a rare occurence, three soldiers were handed jail terms for killings in the troubled Anglophone region.

title: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
content: The government has begun a vaccination programme but officials have been blamed for a slow response.

title: Russian attack on Kharkiv kills two, Ukraine hits missile plant
content: Kharkiv regional administration head, Oleh Syniehubov, reported that 175 'combat clashes' were recorded.

content: Defending champions and co-hosts India face debut-title chasing South Africa in rematch of last T20 World Cup final.

title: Two soldiers killed during military operation in Pakistan’s northwest: Army
content: An explosive-laden motorcycle rammed vehicle in security forces convoy, military says.

originalTitle: Trump lashes out at Supreme Court justices over tariffs ruling
title: Trump lashes out at Supreme Court justices over tariffs ruling
content: The six justices who voted against the tariffs, dealing a major blow to his signature economic policy, should be "absolutely ashamed", Trump said.

originalTitle: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
title: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
content: Far-left militants are suspected of being behind Quentin Deranque's death and the party of Jean-Luc Mélenchon is being widely condemned.

originalTitle: Palestinian Authority in dire straits as Israel's hold on West Bank deepens
title: Palestinian Authority in dire straits as Israel's hold on West Bank deepens
content: More than 30 years after its creation, there are increasing warnings that the PA is close to collapse.

content: Brighton's James Milner starts against Brentford to break the all-time Premier League appearance record of 653.

content: What's eating Arsenal? Sunday's North London derby is now a test of the Gunners' "bottle", says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: 'Losing the dressing room' - what does it mean and how can it happen?
content: "Losing the dressing room" is now part of football's vocabulary. Chief football writer Phil McNulty asks what it means, how it happens and can it be solved?
